frontmatter.title: Rebranding Avenue Code
frontmatter.subtitle: As this San Francisco IT consulting company grew and opened offices around the world, a rebranding was necessary to resonate its identity to a global audience.
frontmatter.activity: Branding & Visual Design; actively contributed throughout the whole project.
frontmatter.designProcess: 4-stage process, from Inspiration to Ideation, Implementation, and Inspection.

node.base: Cover - Artwork featuring a subway map with stations named after Avenue Code practice areas.cover.jpg

Image 02 - Avenue Code previous brand guide section titles featuring Voice, Logo, Font, and Colors.small.jpg
Image 03 - Avenue Code social media post featuring the wording '10 years' surrounded by colorful paint splashes.small.jpg

Image 05 - Colors extracted from the mood board - Mahogany Brown, Viridian Green, Cerulean Blue, Cool Neutral, Deep Violet, Millennial Pink, Coral Red, and Sunshine Yellow.medium.png
Image 07 - Artwork featuring Avenue Code solutions embeded into a crosswalk.medium.jpg
Image 08 - Artwork featuring a subway map with stations named after Avenue Code practice areas.medium.jpg

Image 10 - Google Slides deck guidelines in the style of the new brand Crosswalk theme.medium.png
